practicar

From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [pɾək.tiˈka]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [pɾak.tiˈkaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

practicar (first-person singular present practico, first-person singular preterite practiquí, past participle practicat)

  1. to practice
  2. to discuss, converse, or parlance

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of practicar (first conjugation, c-qu alternation)
infinitive practicar
gerund practicant
past participle masculine feminine
singular practicat practicada
plural practicats practicades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present practico practiques practica practiquem practiqueu practiquen
imperfect practicava practicaves practicava practicàvem practicàveu practicaven
future practicaré practicaràs practicarà practicarem practicareu practicaran
preterite practiquí practicares practicà practicàrem practicàreu practicaren
conditional practicaria practicaries practicaria practicaríem practicaríeu practicarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present practiqui practiquis practiqui practiquem practiqueu practiquin
imperfect practiqués practiquessis practiqués practiquéssim practiquéssiu practiquessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — practica practiqui practiquem practiqueu practiquin
negative (no) — no practiquis no practiqui no practiquem no practiqueu no practiquin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • practicable

Further reading

[edit]
  • “practicar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “practicar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “practicar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “practicar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Interlingua

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

practicar

  1. to practice

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of practicar
infinitive practicar
participle present perfect
practicante practicate
active simple perfect
present practica ha practicate
past practicava habeva practicate
future practicara habera practicate
conditional practicarea haberea practicate
imperative practica —
passive simple perfect
present es practicate ha essite practicate
past esseva practicate habeva essite practicate
future essera practicate habera essite practicate
conditional esserea practicate haberea essite practicate
imperative sia practicate —

Occitan

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Audio (Béarn):(file)

Verb

[edit]

practicar

  1. (transitive) to practise (to perform or observe in a habitual fashion)

Conjugation

[edit]
    Lengadocian (Central Occitan)

infinitive practicar aver practicat

Portuguese

[edit]

Verb

[edit]

practicar (first-person singular present practico, first-person singular preterite practiquei, past participle practicado)

  1. pre-reform spelling (used until 1943 in Brazil and 1911 in Portugal) of praticar

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of practicar (c-qu alternation) (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal practicar
Personal practicar practicares practicar practicarmos practicardes practicarem
Gerund
practicando
Past participle
Masculine practicado practicados
Feminine practicada practicadas
Indicative
Present practico practicas practica practicamos practicais practicam
Imperfect practicava practicavas practicava practicávamos practicáveis practicavam
Preterite practiquei practicaste practicou practicamos1, practicámos2 practicastes practicaram
Pluperfect practicara practicaras practicara practicáramos practicáreis practicaram
Future practicarei practicarás practicará practicaremos practicareis practicarão
Conditional practicaria practicarias practicaria practicaríamos practicaríeis practicariam
Subjunctive
Present practique practiques practique practiquemos practiqueis practiquem
Imperfect practicasse practicasses practicasse practicássemos practicásseis practicassem
Future practicar practicares practicar practicarmos practicardes practicarem
Imperative
Affirmative practica practique practiquemos practicai practiquem
Negative (não) não practiques não practique não practiquemos não practiqueis não practiquem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Spanish

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /pɾaɡtiˈkaɾ/ [pɾaɣ̞.t̪iˈkaɾ]
  • Audio (Venezuela):(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: prac‧ti‧car

Verb

[edit]

practicar (first-person singular present practico, first-person singular preterite practiqué, past participle practicado)

  1. (transitive) to practice
    ¿Practica deportes? ― Do you play sports?
  2. (transitive, intransitive) to exercise

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of practicar (c-qu alternation) (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive practicar
gerund practicando
past participle masculine feminine
singular practicado practicada
plural practicados practicadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present practico practicastú
practicásvos 		practica practicamos practicáis practican

affirmative practicatú
practicávos 		practique practiquemos practicad practiquen
negative no practiques no practique no practiquemos no practiquéis no practiquen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of practicar (c-qu alternation)

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
with infinitive practicar dative practicarme practicarte practicarle, practicarse practicarnos practicaros practicarles, practicarse
accusative practicarme practicarte practicarlo, practicarla, practicarse practicarnos practicaros practicarlos, practicarlas, practicarse
with gerund practicando dative practicándome practicándote practicándole, practicándose practicándonos practicándoos practicándoles, practicándose

accusative practícame practícate practícalo, practícala practícanos not used practícalos, practícalas

accusative practicame practicate practicalo, practicala practicanos not used practicalos, practicalas
with formal second-person singular imperative practique dative practíqueme not used practíquele, practíquese practíquenos not used practíqueles
accusative practíqueme not used practíquelo, practíquela, practíquese practíquenos not used practíquelos, practíquelas
with first-person plural imperative practiquemos dative not used practiquémoste practiquémosle practiquémonos practiquémoos practiquémosles
accusative not used practiquémoste practiquémoslo, practiquémosla practiquémonos practiquémoos practiquémoslos, practiquémoslas
with informal second-person plural imperative practicad dative practicadme not used practicadle practicadnos practicaos practicadles
accusative practicadme not used practicadlo, practicadla practicadnos practicaos practicadlos, practicadlas
with formal second-person plural imperative practiquen dative practíquenme not used practíquenle practíquennos not used practíquenles, practíquense
accusative practíquenme not used practíquenlo, practíquenla practíquennos not used practíquenlos, practíquenlas, practíquense
